title: Nikola, IHS Markit, Moderna: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: U.S. stock futures are down Monday, but the Dow is set to round out its best month since 1987
body:
Here’s what we are watching as markets kick into gear Monday.It’s shaping up to be a blah day after a stellar month. Futures tied to the S&P 500 fell 0.2%, while contracts tied to the Dow declined 0.4%. U.S. stocks are on track to complete a banner November, giving the Dow its best month in over 33 years, as investors cheer the prospect of Covid-19 vaccines halting the pandemic and fresh stimulus spending to bolster the economy. Read our full market wrap here.
—What’s coming up. Mastercard, Advanced Micro Devices, Fastly...
